function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shortage of medical equipment like masks and ventilators due to high labor dependency and crowded working environment","Impact":"Limited capacity of the medical equipment industry and risk of insufficient supplies during pandemics","Mitigation":"Optimizing processing flow, improving automation, and stockpiling of medical equipment","Technologies":"Automation technology for manufacturing medical equipment","People":"Medical equipment industry workers, healthcare professionals, and patients","Owner":"Medical equipment industry, healthcare organizations, and government"},{"Description":"Challenges in using 3D printers for producing medical equipment due to cost and efficiency issues","Impact":"Limited production capacity and high labor requirements for 3D printing technology","Mitigation":"Investment in cost-effective 3D printing technology and process optimization","Technologies":"Cost-effective 3D printing technology","People":"Manufacturers of medical equipment, healthcare professionals, and patients","Owner":"Manufacturers of medical equipment and technology firms"},{"Description":"High infection risks in labor-intensive industries like food processing and delivery","Impact":"Shortages of basic human necessities and high risk of large-scale infection","Mitigation":"Improving automation and reducing labor dependence in these industries","Technologies":"Automation technology for food processing and delivery","People":"Workers in food processing and delivery industries, consumers","Owner":"Industry associations, technology firms, and government"}]}
